Class OpenID::FakeOpenIDServiceEndpoint
In: lib/openid/service.rb
Parent: OpenIDServiceEndpoint

Used for providing an OpenIDService like object to the OpenID library for 1.X link rel discovery. See the documentation for OpenID::OpenIDService for more information on what this object does.
